sentence.Network_en: He walked towards the summerhouse, at first furtively, then with more confidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他朝凉亭走去，开始还偷偷摸摸地，后来就壮大了胆子。

sentence.Network_en: Gave us the use of their summerhouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 允许我们使用他们的凉亭.

sentence.Network_en: But mostly we gloried in our second spring at the summerhouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是最让我们引以自豪的是夏舍里的第二个春天.
